nodes.text: The Statuary Park was a park on the First Death Star where residents could be admitted and have a guided tour for a price. Visitors could also buy birdseed at the park. Despite the Death Star being of Imperial origin, at least one of the statues in the statuary park portrayed General Grievous, Supreme Commander of the Separatist Droid Army for the Confederacy of Independent Systems, an old nemesis of the Empire's antecessor state, the Galactic Republic.
